entity.name: mp_term_infos
entity.query: select 'mp' as dataType, term_id, name, definition from mp_term_infos where term_id !='MP:0000001'

entity.name: disease
entity.query: select distinct 'disease' as type, ds.disease_id, ds.disease_term, ds.disease_alts, CASE ds.disease_classes when '' THEN 'unclassified' ELSE ds.disease_classes END as disease_classes, ds.human_curated, ds.mouse_curated, ds.mgi_predicted, ds.impc_predicted, ds.mgi_predicted_in_locus, ds.impc_predicted_in_locus from disease_summary ds, disease_mouse_genotype_associations dmga, mp_mouse_models mmm where ds.disease_id=dmga.disease_id and dmga.mouse_model_id=mmm.mouse_model_id and mmm.mp_id='${mp_term_infos.term_id}'

entity.name: disease_phenotypes
entity.query: select concat(dh.hp_id, '_' , hp.name) as phenotype from disease_hp dh join hp_term_infos hp on hp.term_id = dh.hp_id where dh.disease_id = '${disease.disease_id}';

entity.name: mp_term_subsets
entity.query: select subset from mp_term_subsets where term_id='${mp_term_infos.term_id}'

entity.name: mp_synonyms
entity.query: select distinct syn_name from mp_synonyms where term_id = '${mp_term_infos.term_id}'

entity.name: mp_dbxrefs
entity.query: select distinct xref_id from mp_dbxrefs where term_id='${mp_term_infos.term_id}' and xref_id like 'GO:%'

entity.name: mp_node2term
entity.query: select distinct node_id from mp_node2term where term_id='${mp_term_infos.term_id}'

entity.name: mp_node_top_level
entity.query: select distinct top_level_node_id from mp_node_top_level where node_id=${mp_node2term.node_id}

entity.name: mp_node2term2
entity.query: select distinct term_id from mp_node2term where node_id=${mp_node_top_level.top_level_node_id}

entity.name: mp_term_infos2
entity.query: select term_id as top_level_mp_id, name as top_level_mp_term, definition from mp_term_infos where term_id='${mp_node2term2.term_id}' and term_id != 'MP:0000001'

entity.name: mp_node2term3
entity.query: select distinct node_id from mp_node2term where term_id='${mp_term_infos.term_id}'

entity.name: mp_parent_children
entity.query: select distinct parent_node_id, child_node_id from mp_parent_children where child_node_id=${mp_node2term3.node_id}

entity.name: mp_parent_children
entity.query: select distinct child_node_id from mp_parent_children where parent_node_id=${mp_parent_children.parent_node_id}

entity.name: mp_node2term
entity.query: select distinct term_id from mp_node2term where node_id=${mp_parent_children.child_node_id}

entity.name: phenotype_call_summary
entity.query: select count(*) from phenotype_call_summary where mp_acc='${mp_node2term3.term_id}'

entity.name: mp_term_infos3
entity.query: select distinct term_id, name, definition from mp_term_infos where term_id='${mp_node2term3.term_id}'

entity.name: mp_mappings
entity.query: select distinct mapped_term_id from mp_mappings where term_id='${mp_term_infos.term_id}' and ontology='MA'

entity.name: ma_term_infos
entity.query: select name from ma_term_infos where term_id='${mp_mappings.mapped_term_id}'

entity.name: ma_node_2_selected_top_level_mapping
entity.query: select distinct ti.term_id, ti.name from ma_node2term nt, ma_node_2_selected_top_level_mapping m, ma_term_infos ti where nt.node_id=m.node_id and m.top_level_term_id=ti.term_id and nt.term_id='${mp_mappings.mapped_term_id}'

entity.name: phenotype_call_summary
entity.query: select distinct gf_acc, procedure_id, parameter_id, pipeline_id, allele_acc, strain_acc from phenotype_call_summary where mp_acc='${mp_term_infos.term_id}' and gf_db_id=3 and gf_acc like 'MGI:%' and allele_acc is not null and strain_acc is not null

entity.name: allele
entity.query: select distinct symbol, acc from allele where acc='${phenotype_call_summary.allele_acc}' and gf_acc='${phenotype_call_summary.gf_acc}'

entity.name: strain
entity.query: select distinct name, acc from strain where acc='${phenotype_call_summary.strain_acc}' and db_id=3

entity.name: phenotype_pipeline
entity.query: select distinct stable_id, name, stable_key from phenotype_pipeline where id=${phenotype_call_summary.pipeline_id}

entity.name: phenotype_procedure
entity.query: select distinct name, stable_id, stable_key from phenotype_procedure where id = ${phenotype_call_summary.procedure_id}

entity.name: phenotype_parameter
entity.query: select distinct name, stable_id, stable_key from phenotype_parameter where id=${phenotype_call_summary.parameter_id}
